name: Kosmo Laika: Guide to Space
description:
Do you know who was the first woman to go to space? What about the first animal? Don't panic! Laika will guide you through these discoveries and many more!

Kosmo Laika: Guide to Space is a puzzle game of curiosities about space. You will be challenged to test your knowledge, combine exclusive patches to find the first visionaries in space, meet the "animalnauts" and conquerors of the Moon. In this game, Laika will be your guide, taking you into space and beyond, like you never imagined.

Featuring:

  • 70 different patches to combine and discover historical facts and important moments of the space missions;


  • Complete over 25 moments of the space race;

  • Drag and drop the patches in the right places and complete the mission;



  • Earn exclusive stamps;


  • Increase your knowledge of the history of astronomy;

  • Learn all about space heroes;

  • Meet the first animalnauts of the missions.


  • Great soundtrack. Original sound effects designed exclusively for the best experience.

Test your knowledge of space exploration and the achievements that are part of the history of the world, with the help of Laika, the first space astronaut puppy.

For all lovers of trivia and puzzle games and who admire the stars!
